#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <string.h>
#include <stack>
#include <set>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	int n;
	cin >> t;
	
	int i;
	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		// long long arr[n];
		string str;
		char ch;
		vector < pair <string, int > > arr;
		pair <string,int> vote; 
		set <string> voters;
		pair<set<string>::iterator,bool> ret;

		for (i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin >> str >> ch;
			ret = voters.insert(str);
			int temp;
			if (ch == '+')
				temp = 1;
			else
				temp = -1;
			if (ret.second == true)			//new voter
			{
				// cout << "\nFound a new voter\n";
				vote = make_pair(str,temp);
				arr.push_back(vote);	
			}
			else
			{
				for (int j=0;j<arr.size();j++)
				{
					if ((arr[j].first).compare(str) == 0)
					{	
						arr[j].second = temp;
						break;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		int count = 0;
		// cout << arr.size() << endl;
		for (i=0; i<arr.size(); i++)
		{
			count += arr[i].second;
			// cout << i << " " << arr[i].first << " " << arr[i].second << endl;
		}
		cout << count << endl;
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
